18  package org.apache.log4j.util;
19  
20  import org.apache.oro.text.perl.Perl5Util;
21  
22  public class ControlFilter implements Filter {
23  
24    Perl5Util util = new Perl5Util();
25  
26    String[] allowedPatterns;
27  
28    public ControlFilter(String[] allowedPatterns) {
29      this.allowedPatterns = allowedPatterns;
30    }
31  
32    public 
33    String filter(String in) throws UnexpectedFormatException{
34      int len = allowedPatterns.length;
35      for(int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
36        //System.out.println("["+allowedPatterns[i]+"]");
37        if(util.match("/"+allowedPatterns[i]+"/", in)) {
38  	//System.out.println("["+in+"] matched ["+allowedPatterns[i]);
39  	return in;
40        }	
41      }
42  
43      throw new UnexpectedFormatException("["+in+"]");
44    }
45  }
